Here's how. Mon, 06 Jan 2025 03:55:11 +0000 Photo / 123rf
Man in court charged with murder after child’s body delivered to Manukau Police Station https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-in-court-charged-with-murder-after-childs-body-delivered-to-manukau-police-station/NV3Q3WMGDFHVTFK4YYVW6ZMDDM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-in-court-charged-with-murder-after-childs-body-delivered-to-manukau-police-station/NV3Q3WMGDFHVTFK4YYVW6ZMDDM/ The man allegedly killed the child on Sunday before taking the body to the station. Mon, 06 Jan 2025 03:52:36 +0000 Police have launched an investigation following a serious incident outside their Manukau Police Station overnight. Photo / Hayden Woodward
Intricate Māori carving found washed up in Bay of Islands, Northland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/intricate-maori-carving-found-washed-up-in-bay-of-islands-northland/CXURJOQOANFJRJOYSDSQWZOJKA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/intricate-maori-carving-found-washed-up-in-bay-of-islands-northland/CXURJOQOANFJRJOYSDSQWZOJKA/ Mystery surrounds a large, ornate Māori carving found washed up on a beach. Mon, 06 Jan 2025 03:43:13 +0000 A Northland kaitiaki is hoping to find the owners of this large Ngāpuhi-style carving that was found washed up on a Northland beach. Photo Arana Rewha
State Highway 3 by Mount Messenger in Taranaki closed by fertiliser spill https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/state-highway-3-by-mount-messenger-in-taranaki-close-by-fertiliser-spill/74MNL4KHFFCBFCX6UUV5MDYRTE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/state-highway-3-by-mount-messenger-in-taranaki-close-by-fertiliser-spill/74MNL4KHFFCBFCX6UUV5MDYRTE/ The spill was reported to police just before 12pm. Mon, 06 Jan 2025 03:34:45 +0000 A truck spilled a load of urea on SH3 at Mt Messenger, Taranaki, causing significant delays during the cleanup. Image / Ross Land
Rain eases water restrictions in Napier and Hastings https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/rain-eases-water-restrictions-in-napier-and-hastings/Q46BWXB7UNCEZDCRTCNQC7NTDU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/rain-eases-water-restrictions-in-napier-and-hastings/Q46BWXB7UNCEZDCRTCNQC7NTDU/ Linda HallThe sprinkler ban has been lifted, with level 2 allowing some periodic use of them. Mon, 06 Jan 2025 02:54:40 +0000 Water restrictions in Napier and Hastings (excluding Waimārama) have been dropped from Level 3 to Level 2. Photo / NZME
Three-year-old dies after being hit by car in Gore driveway https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/third-year-old-dies-after-being-hit-by-car-in-gore-driveway/H7HBOAI55ZFH3NFLVVHAZNQRZY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/third-year-old-dies-after-being-hit-by-car-in-gore-driveway/H7HBOAI55ZFH3NFLVVHAZNQRZY/ The child died in Gore Hospital a short time later. Mon, 06 Jan 2025 02:42:30 +0000 A 3-year-old child has died after being struck by a vehicle on a driveway at a residential address in Gore, Southland.
Gisborne News Digest: Gisborne’s rescue chopper flew seven times over festive season https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-news-digest-gisbornes-rescue-chopper-flew-7-times-over-festive-season/V4IKR4ZTFJDWVFPZBKSRNQHLNI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-news-digest-gisbornes-rescue-chopper-flew-7-times-over-festive-season/V4IKR4ZTFJDWVFPZBKSRNQHLNI/ 'We just have to make the safest decision in response to the conditions we are faced with' Mon, 06 Jan 2025 02:36:50 +0000 A multi-service response to the scene of a New Year’s Eve motor vehicle accident in the Waioeka Gorge in which a car went down a bank near Opato Bridge.
